Sword.description: A sharp-looking sword, perfect for close combat.

Axe.description: A heavy battle axe, capable of dealing massive damage.

Dagger.description: A small but lethal dagger, ideal for stealth attacks.

Bow.description: A finely crafted bow with a quiver full of arrows.

Magic Staff.description: An enchanted staff, brimming with arcane energy.

Flaming Sword.description: A sword engulfed in flames, burning everything it touches.

Crossbow.description: A mechanical crossbow that shoots powerful bolts.

Mace.description: A spiked mace for smashing enemies in close combat.

Warhammer.description: A heavy warhammer that can crush armor.

Spear.description: A long spear perfect for thrusting attacks from a distance.

Helmet.description: A bronze helmet offering protection for the head.

Chestplate.description: A heavy iron chestplate for upper body protection.

Greaves.description: Iron greaves that protect the legs.

Gauntlets.description: Steel gauntlets that protect the hands and arms.

Dragon Scale Armor.description: Armor made from the scales of a dragon, providing exceptional protection.

Leather Armor.description: Light armor made from hardened leather, offering mobility and decent protection.

Potion of healing.description: A small vial filled with a glowing red liquid that instantly restores a portion of the drinker's health.

Great potion of healing.description: A larger vial containing a radiant red liquid, capable of restoring a significant amount of health.
